It took me awhile to get around to reading this recent translation Sec 
posted on the Fujita family history and I'm wondering if anyone else is 
taking this they way I am. Obviously I'm missed some important list 
posts or totally misread them  until now if this has been clarified from 
the original idea that Tatsuo was adopted into the family...----


Although he was born as the third son of Fujita Goroo and Tokio, there 
was no description in the family record.-

*** So this means that Tatsuo was in act Tokio's and Hajime's natural child?


***The thing that has me totally crazy is the following--


<<The reason for this is that he was adopted from Numazawa Kohachiroo 
and Kuni immediately after his birth.>> Followed by this--><<Since there 
was no child between Kohachiroo and Kuni, Numazawa family was in danger 
of extinction.  They had asked Fujita Goroo and Tokio to adopt their 
child if it was a boy.  They had asked them even when Tatsuo was not 
born yet.

Fujita family accepted this, and soon after the birth of boy, Numazawa 
family adopted him out.>>

*** To me this says----The Numazawas had no children and were on the 
verge of becoming extinct as a family therefore they adopted the third 
Fujita son they didn't have him then turn him over to Tokio and Hajime....


-- 

Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
